title: Giro d’Italia Women Stage 6: Lippert Edges out Edwards in Breakaway Sprint, Longo Borghini Defends Pink
content:
Longo Borghini retains three-second lead over Kopecky ahead of big GC battle Saturday on the Blockhaus summit.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Women Stage 6: Lippert Edges out Edwards in Breakaway Sprint, Longo Borghini Defends Pink on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
